scenario_text.value:
Kaito, please stop! Is this what you think
Miu would want?!

Oh, shut up! You’re just using Miu to try to
force me into doing what you think is right!

You know what? Maybe I am being forceful
right now, but I’d only regret keeping quiet!

And I am done with regrets, so I don’t want
you to have any either!

You’re not the kind of person who would enjoy
destroying the world, and neither was Miu!

If you don’t realize that, you shouldn’t be
wielding so much power!

Shut up! Just shut up! You don’t get to
decide what’s in our hearts!
